actionCalls.description: saves all changes to the database so we can do our final checks
actionCalls.name: Commit_Transaction
actionCalls.label: Commit Transaction

actionCalls.description: this apex class converts the selected choices on the screen into a variable that can be looped through in the flow
actionCalls.name: ParseChoiceSelection
actionCalls.label: ParseChoiceSelection

actionCalls.description: this apex class converts the selected choices on the screen into a variable that can be looped through in the flow
actionCalls.name: ParseDiscountChoiceSelection
actionCalls.label: ParseDiscountChoiceSelection

assignments.description: once the user leaves the plan selection screen we do not allow them to go back and change....for some reason the defaults for plan fees do not get updated if it returns and then is changed
assignments.name: SetOpptyFields
assignments.label: SetOpptyFields

assignments.description: set the variable so that it won't change during rest of flow - memorializes the user selected value
assignments.name: SetPlanChangeIndicator
assignments.label: SetPlanChangeIndicator

constants.description: minimum price that a plan that includes Ad Spend can be...b/c we allocate this fixed amount to Ad Spend for those plans
constants.name: cPlanWithAdSpendMinPrice

decisions.description: user entered price should never be greater than list price --- this would cause Discount to be greater than 100%
decisions.name: Plan_FeePriceValidator
decisions.label: Plan&FeePriceValidator

Flow.description: ===pre-ChargeBees=== Presents a screen to user to select a tier plan and fees on opportunity

formulas.name: fConstructDiscountString
fConstructString

formulas.description: anything other than Pro should be considered "Custom" for searching in the product name for proper plan and one-time fee
formulas.name: fWebsiteDesignSearchText

Flow.label: Opportunity Manage Products

loops.description: Loop through selected AddOns and construct a collection variable AND increment counters and values
loops.name: LoopProducts
loops.label: LoopProducts

recordLookups.description: Assumption is that there is only a single one time setup fee line item per opportunity
recordLookups.name: GetOneTimeFeeOpptyLineItem
recordLookups.label: GetOneTimeFeeOpptyLineItem

recordLookups.name: GetOneTimeListPrice
recordLookups.label: GetOneTimeListPrice
recordLookups.filterLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 and (5 OR 6) and 7

recordLookups.description: Assumption is that there is only a single one time setup fee line item per opportunity
recordLookups.name: GetPlanLineItem
recordLookups.label: GetPlanLineItem

recordLookups.description:
updated to remove two conditions due to removing the need for having a pair of plan products: one with (Pro) and one with (Custom) --- this was in place b/c there were two different list prices for plan/website design combination and this is no longer the case...It is the case for One Time Setup Fee.
If we need to put it back in place do the following: 1) Add Name Contains Website_Design 2) Add Name Contains fWebsiteDesignSearchText 3) change condition requirements to Custom ( 1 and 2 and 3 and 4 and (5 or 6) )
recordLookups.name: GetPlanListPrice
recordLookups.label: GetPlanListPrice

recordLookups.description: Need to do this loop vs. relying on the line rollUp flow populating the Number of IDX Product Lines in time...so do the count here as well.
recordLookups.name: GetUpdatedLineItems
recordLookups.label: GetUpdatedLineItems

recordUpdates.description: This update relies on other flows to properly add the products that are included with the tier plan AND if the tier plan is changed the other flow will delete all line items are start over
recordUpdates.name: UpdateOpptyFields
recordUpdates.label: UpdateOpptyFields

fields.name: AddOnPriceIvalidMessage
fields.fieldText: The sales price you entered for either the add-on is higher than the list price. Please click Previous and adjust the value.

fields.name: AdSpendDiscountErrorMsg
fields.fieldText: You cannot discount Ad Spend addOns. The sales price you entered must equal the list price. Please click Previous and adjust the value.

fields.name: ConfirmationSectionDealSummary
fields.fieldText:
CONFIRMATION SCREEN


You are about to update your opportunity with the following details:


OPPORTUNITY SUMMARY

Account Name: {!GetOpptyRecord.Account.Name}

Opportunity Name: {!GetOpptyRecord.Name}

Tier Plan: {!Tier_Plan} {!fPlanChangeText}

Website Design: {!Website_Design} {!fWebsiteDesignChangeText}

fields.name: ConfirmationSectionAddOn
fields.fieldText:
ADD-ONS ADDED to OPPORTUNITY

Number of AddOn Products: {!vCounter}

AddOn Products: {!vCommaSeperatedString}

fields.name: ConfirmationScreenPlanFee
fields.fieldText:
UPDATED PLAN FEE

Plan Fee: {!Plan_Sales_Price}

(List Price = ${!GetPlanListPrice.UnitPrice})

fields.name: ConfirmationSectionFee
fields.fieldText:
UPDATED PLAN ONE TIME FEE

One-Time Fee: {!One_Time_Fee}

(List Price = ${!GetOneTimeListPrice.UnitPrice})

fields.name: ConfirmationSectionDiscounts
fields.fieldText:
DISCOUNTS APPLIED to SELECTED ADD-ONS

Number of AddOns Discounted: {!vDiscountToAddCount}

AddOn Products: {!vCommaSeperatedDiscountString}

fields.name: ConfirmationSectionReqFields

fields.fieldText: Subscription Start Date

fields.name: In_App_Onboarding
fields.fieldText: In-App Onboarding

fields.fieldText: Website Design is Pro, typically In-App Onboarding is set to "Yes"

fields.name: FooterMessage
fields.fieldText: Please click Confirm to continue and exit

fields.name: ScreenInstructions
fields.fieldText:
CONSTRUCT OPPORTUNITY

﻿Please enter fee adjustments & add ons then click Construct Opportunity.

fields.fieldText:

Website Design: {!Website_Design} {!fWebsiteDesignChangeText}

fields.name: DiscountApprovalMessage
fields.fieldText:
You do not have permission to give a discount for Plan and/or Setup Fee below the floor value shown on previous screen.


Please reach out to an approver to enter values below the floor for you.

fields.name: ValidationDiscountMessage
fields.fieldText: You selected "Yes" for applying a discount, but did not enter proper discount information. Please return to previous screen and adjust.

fields.fieldText:
You must create a MLS Board for each IDX Tool product in your opportunity.


Please remember to add the appropriate amount of MLS Boards on the related list of this opportunity.


Number of MLS Boards: {!GetOpptyRecord.Number_of_MLS_Boards__c}


Number of IDX Tool Products: {!vIDXToolQuantityCount}

fields.name: PlanFeeInvalidMessage
fields.fieldText: The sales price you entered for either the plan or one-time fee is higher than the list price. Please click Previous and adjust the value(s).

fields.name: PlanPriceTooLowScreenErrorMsg
fields.fieldText: The sales price you entered for the Plan is too low it must be greater than or equal to {!cPlanWithAdSpendMinPrice} which is the ad spend allocation. Please return to previous screen and adjust.
